message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
I think 60-40 is a fair split, but I'm willing to negotiate. Let's get this done quickly before inflation eats away at our profits.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
I'm willing to go down to 55-45. Let's get this done before we both lose even more to inflation.
I'll meet you in the middle of our last offers, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
